bwwExcerpt: Into the Woods, which became a Meryl Streep movie in 2014, is one of Sondheim's most popular shows. This new production follows previous Broadway runs in 1987 and 2002. They say three's a charm - and this revival has it to spare.
showScoreExcerpt:
